title: bhujanga bhUSaNa
sahitya:
bhujanga bhUSaNa purANa puruSA bhUta nAyakA mAmava 


anupallavi

  gajAnana janaka gangA shashidhara nijabhakta mandAra nigamAgamAdhAra


caraNam    carAcarAdi sakala lOka samrakSaNacaNa sadguNa parAdi 
satvArikAtmaka bhavapAsha mOshaka virAT-svarUpA 
vimalAkAra harikEshapura akhilANDa nAyakA
